content.detailedDescription: On saturday, august 18th, 2012, i was returning home from a demonstration. i was heading west on 195 from new bedford massachusetts to westport, massachusetts when something  in the sky over the southwest horizon caught my eye. it was an orange/ yellow and reddish  glowing ball that seemed to shoot straight up from the horizon in the southwest over the tree line, maybe about 500 feet. so i pulled over into the breakdown lane to watch it because i thought i was imagining this. wow a ufo i thought maybe? so i watched it do some fantastic maneuvers while i called some different people to tell them about what i was seeing!! this thing then hovered there for  a couple of minutes then it suddenly darted up about another 500 feet and then darted left or to the  south and hovered there. kind of at  90 degree angle. i could not believe my eyes. i was awestruck! then as  i was watching that one another one did the same thing it shot straight up from the tree line to about 500 feet  hovered then darted left or south just underneath the first one and hovered there  for about 2 minutes then it darted straight up maybe about  another 500 feet or so as if to be side by side with the first one and they both hovered there. then to my surprise  a treat! up came another one, a third one! came straight up from the horizon over the tree line to about 500 feet hovered for a few minutes then darted south just underneath the other two that were still hovering above. i thought this is amazing! i am seeing three ufo's i am so lucky. the third one did the same as the first two. they all then were hovering in a straight row the all of a sudden they all darted south then just disappeared!!!! i will never forget this! i am not very good with dates, times and distance but i will never forget this date!!! i have no photos wish i did but i was too busy on the phone telling people what i was seeing!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Possible ufo sightings

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking on terrace of my house.I saw him comming over a tree towards me
firstly i was scared...And then imediatly the object comes over my head, and takes a round... and goes to south.... i wants to know that what was it... after a few seconds it's gone...
content.summary: I was on my terrace,i am scared on seeing him over myhead after a few seconda it's gone

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving and was stopped at a stop light all of a sudden a huge bright light flashed out of the sky appeared to be falling. huge white. lasted minimum 5 seconds.  was waiting on light to change and just above the  stoplight 
i thought the object was a meteor but way too bright to be one. so bright 
look liked it fell out of the sky abruptly like a meteor but was as bright as a  very high powered flashlight. 
i yelled omg what was that ??  and no one else in the car saw it. it happened on literally 2 seconds

i lost sight because it just flashed. didn't leave. just disappeared
content.summary: Flash of light very bright. saw a white ball shoot down abruptly out of sky

content.detailedDescription: Driving car. lights climbing v shape or diamond formation. my son passenger side thought double bladed helicopter. i thought maybe stealth bomber. but no center red light observed on this craf. had 6 or more yellow type lights dim. we both later agreed look like nick menza ufo july 2014 video on you tube but no lights were circling it. my son minutes before we seen this craft commented seen a light to the north like a airport search light but he said this light was not rotating but would come on and go off. but look as bright as what an airport rotating light would be. object was climbing and banking. we felt it was maybe military. i continued driving west and son watch it in a continued bank head se away fron us until trees got in the way. lights were still dim but bright enough to see but none were blinking like typical aircraft are required to.
content.summary: Was driving east bound on interstate 94 near willow run airport. craft flew directly over interstate in a bank and climbing. look like nick menza video on you tube.

content.detailedDescription: On friday nite july 25, 2014, at 9:30pm was traveling on gessner rd turning west on to kempwood dr. when i turned 3 objects were right in my face. i pulled up into a gas station and got out. 3 lights that were flashing red, blue, yellow and white. 1 object was larger then the other 2 it ws size of vw car. it moved around but did stay more stationary then the other 2. the other 2 moved so fast up-down- backward-forward - would stop on a dime and change direction all while flashing these lights .The lights did change times of the flashes sometimes. it did not stay flashing the exacte amoumt of time the whole time. they formed triangles several times and 1 time 1 of the small ones flew into the big one, the big light disapearred, then the little showed back up. i watched for about 10 mins then had to leave to come to  work.We do have friends that saw it from my neighborhood and filmed with their phones.I didnot have a phone to film of my own, i was less than a football field away from them, they were not plane, helicopters, remote controlls , they were huge lights moviing everywere and no sound. i got ver nervous and felt scaredso i decided to leave.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 lights changing coclors moving rapid all over the place

content.detailedDescription: It was hovering for about 2 hrs and people were looking like what is this thing
content.summary: It was observed by many people and display on national news channel website

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on porch.  reading....Heard a buzzing odd sound.  looked up saw what looked like a ufo just to the right to of the house across the street. occasional blue lights flashed faintly. i took a picture as fast as i could.  when i looked back to the ufo...Complete dark sky...Nothing.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Noticed it and snapped picture...Then it was gone completely

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the front poach when i saw three objects flying around two airplanes they look like orbs .They made a loop around the planes and then just disappeared but one reappered then disappeared again this happened for about 5min. then they were gone all together well i could not understood what just happened so  i didn't say nothing .Later on that evening i was sitting in the same spot and saw what looked like a red cigar shaped object flying kind of low making no noise at all it look like it had windows on it ,this was a big object and i didn't know why it didn't make any noise .Are we getting visits like this all of the time because i know what i saw it just hard to tell anyone because they all think that i'm crazy .
content.summary: Made some loops around airplane

content.detailedDescription:
1. out site of a construction security site.
2. the object flashed multiple different colors in the distance.
3. maybe a meteor or something, so i went inside and got my phone to google it. when i came back outside the object was gone. i went to talk to my partner but he ignored me when i talking about he meteor. when i went back inside to continue my patrol i spotted the object again but this time is was ascending.
4. the surface was black and wasn't illuminated even by its own lights. it looked like either a cross or a diamond i couldn't really be sure.
5. during the initial sighting i was intrigued by it, after i saw it moving towards me i began to panic slightly these things have always terrified me and interested me at the same time. 
6. it flew over head silently and went off into the distance banking though the air.
content.summary: Object was off in the distance flashing, it then flew over my head at my security site.

content.detailedDescription: I was playing golf at timber trace  in pinckney michigan. i hit a shot from the right side of the fairway on hole number four and was standing around looking at the sky which was still sunny for being well past 8pm but several darks clouds were moving across the sky as well. i noticed a solid gray disc-shaped object hovering about 100 feet above the tree tops across the street from the road aligning the left side of the fairway facing north east. at first glance i thought it was a big balloon of some sort.  as i got closer to it i noticed it wasn't moving at all and it was too low to be a plane or anything. it looked to be maybe 10-20 feet in diameter.  i kept staring at it and just couldn't figure out what heck it was.  i was totally mesmerized and didn't wanna stop looking at it but i had to move to the green because people were waiting to tee off behind me. unfortunately the tall pines surrounding it blocked my view of the object but i assumed it would still be sitting there when i finished putting and crossed the street to the next hole. i finished putting quickly and went out to the street and it was gone. i was really disappointed as i thought i'd be able to get my phone out of my bag and snap a few pictures. i never imagined i would see something like that especially in broad day light and it totally caught me off guard. i always watch the stars at night and have seen every kind of thing you'd expect to see in the sky but i always thought if i were to ever see a ufo it would it be some sort  of strange lights in the night.
content.summary: Was golfing and looked up over the pine trees and a gray disc was hovering about 50-100 ft above the treetops

content.detailedDescription: The hovering object flee stratum and disappeared from sight.
content.summary: Sphere shaped object emitting multiple colors, hovered in small circles then flee straight up with extreme speed.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed through my apartment window, an object travelling a straight path over lake michigan.  it had a red glow.  admittedly, it was going at the speed of an airplane--i see airplanes flying regularly.  i took a closer look at the object for a few seconds, and then it stopped glowing.  it is as if it vanished.
content.summary: Saw a object solid glow of red travelling a straight path and then seems to disappear

content.detailedDescription:
j�� vi v��rios que s��o um tempo no ar (em momentos diferentes)
e depois desaparecem, como se um portal, ou algo l��.
cores sortidas, principalmente cinza claro, ��s vezes azul. -
content.summary: Ufo área visitada. pare por um momento e se tornar invisível.

content.detailedDescription: We were admiring the stars because the sky was clear when we were in the backyard of friends when we noticed a moving red light. but it was different. it hovered and moved slightly right and left. hovered and moved up and down. we watched it for about 5 minutes and it was staying in the same position but hovered and moved to the right and left. the first thought i had was i was a little afraid but thought it was amazing. but when it continued to just hover i began to wonder what it was. our friends we staring at it as well, and we all were a little where it was going or looking at. after about 5 - 7 minutes it started to move towards the ground however, trees were in our way to witness it further. we lost it moving towards the ground in the distance.
content.summary: Hovering object side to side up and down and moved quickly at times

content.detailedDescription: I got a call from a neighbor down the street that he was seeing lights that his daughter pointed out and i should look outside.  i could not see anything as my trees obstructed my view so i walked to his house.  when i got there i could see the lights in a row, on following the other taking the same path.  my neighbor said at one point a group of 5 or so spun in a circle and that was when he was pretty sure they were not aircraft.  i noticed that they did not blink like aircraft do just solid red lights.  so i pulled out my cell phone and tried to video it.  real dark video but in some of the footage you can see 2 to 3 red dots in the sky.  they moved from the west to the east then gained altitude then went north.  this was while looking north from our location. i saw about twenty and my neighbor saw many more maybe around 100. i am uploading the very dark video as it was recorded.  i am going to edit it later to try and brighten it up some to see if i can see any additional detail.
content.summary: Red lights evenly spaced like a convoy

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside around 9:15pm on 07/26/2014 and saw 3-4 glowing orange red triangular? shaped objects moving smoothly and silently across the sky in a triangle formation. after they passed overhead another group of 4-5 moved across the sky in the same direction. i called my friend bob who lives several blocks away to go outside and look at the sky as i watched a third group follow the same path as the others in his direction. while i talked to him he could see them pass overhead.  i thought it was over when another group of lights moved across the sky in the same direction. after the last group flew over a single orange glowing light followed the others. i think there may have been at least of these lights.
content.summary: 20 red orange glowing objects flew overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was with two people and one of them was convince of seeing a moving ufo looking west from sculpture meadow park in yonkers near the metro north yonkers train station stop. i posted her name on facebook to her ufo group there in yonkers. i was conducting my ce-5 with my boom boxes and sync them with apple products to tibetan bowls tones and dr. steven greer et tools program meditation. i am being follow around by a fleet of ufos that can be seen on clear night skies with the naked eye that anyone can see them. i'm familiar with these objects for years. they constantly move. i'm use to these objects and feel comfortable with these alien ships. i never lose sight of these objects. their always keep me in their sights throughout the world.
content.summary: I was with two people doing a ce-5 in yonkers by the hudson river. lady confirm of seeing a ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my car on i-91 in connecticut around wallingford. i was on the phone with my boyfriend and i saw these lights which from a far i thought it aas just an airplane. but as i got closer i realized that the lights were closer too. there were no street lights on the part of the highway i was on so the green and red lights wet very bright. as i started driving closer i noticed it was right above me. i got really scared and i called my mom right away. i lost sight when i drove away.
content.summary: Driving on the highway, thought it was a plane but as i got closer realized it was right above the cars hovering. there was 2 of them

content.detailedDescription:
El platillo de color gris oscuro se acerc������������������������������������������������������ hacia nosotros. 
sentimos que estaba observandonos. estuvo unos minutos y se alejo.
se fu������������������������������������������������������ hacia la misma direccion por la que vino.

the dark gray saucer came towards us.We feel that was watching us.
it was a few minutes and walked away. it was at the same address which came
content.summary: Platillo que se acercó y luego se fue.  saucer came and then left.

content.detailedDescription:
1. at home, taking my dog outside.

2. the lights could easily be spotted.  they were definitely strange enough to catch anyone's attention.

3. i've seen them before and reported the spotting about 3 years ago, around the same time, and month.  my guess are chinese lanterns.  i did a short research to see what was going on in "lancaster ny, and buffalo" but failed to find anything about " balloons " or anything floating devices that might be tested.  

4.  the objects were "aspirin size" they floating up and down from left to right.  the set in the back seem to be connected in and a half circle type of shape.

5. i was astonished to see them again. 

6.  they floated behind the trees.
content.summary: Wavy, pulsating lights.  a set farther back seemed to be connected

content.detailedDescription:
Desde un punto determinado apenas 12 metros de distancia . veo luces y centellas multicolores que se desprenden hacia mi. 
from one just 12 meters away point. i see lights and multicolored sparks that come off to me.
content.summary: Luces, centellas y destellos hacia mi.  lights, sparks and flashes at me

content.detailedDescription: In back garden, looking at the stars as i often do , spotted this star shape object, brighter than a star , was fluid movement and was alot faster than a plane would be if you was watching a plane in flight, watched it travel from northeast towards the east ( i think) and only lost sight of it as it left my line of sight, tryed take picture and record it
content.summary: Little bit bigger than a star , fluid flight path

content.detailedDescription:
I was prepping for a golf tournament (nj, usa), so i recorded my swing. i went on vacation & viewed the footage.  i saw something zip by. then, i slowed and zoomed the images only to discover that the ufo was heading south to north (@ supersonic speed) then it made a 45* turn heading east.  
i am a firm believer in eti and as soon as i saw the footage i knew exactly what it was. at that point i began to view frame by frame, took snapshots of the frames and zoomed in. it is amazing. i know this may sound a bit strange, but i often send my positive energy into the universe. this event (to me) was a response from eti.
content.summary: Ufo approached camera, supersonic 45* turn. pretty clear image at zoom

content.detailedDescription: I was outside stargazing and praying. a star like structure that kept on moving instantly new it was a spaceship.
content.summary: Big light flashing by and airplane and helicopter passing by to compare it by and this thing was definately a spaceship

content.detailedDescription: I'm sitting on the balcony of my resort and i saw this light. at first i thought it was a plane. but it was extremly bright. to the point that i could see 3 individual lights. so i watched it for about 10 mins and it didnt move. so i thought maybe it was a star. but it had three lights. and i looked around and i could not see any other stars. then it started to get extremly bright. then it disappeared.
content.summary: Hovering light in orlando

content.detailedDescription:
It was around july 4th.  i looked outside to see all the fireworks going on that my neighbors were playing with.
the 3 lights that i saw surprised me simply because they were not supposed to be there.  i thought maybe a cellphone tower had been built that i didn't know about.  the lights were equidistant apart, high in the sky, not moving, just there.  orange in color.  they didn't move.  there was some flickering with the topmost one but i atributed that to a passing cloud.  i don't know how long they were actually there maybe 20 minutes or so.  the next day and night i looked to see if they were still there so i would know it was a tower of some kind but there was nothing.

i just wonder what it was.   the lights were in a verticle position.  not horizontal.
content.summary: Not fireworks. 3 lights equidistant from eachother stationary high up didn't move.  like a cell tower but no tower there.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking along the poudre trail headed west when i thought i saw a bear in the distance. this would be unusual but not unheard of. i felt afraid and wondered if my eyes were playing tricks on me. it was approximately 0730 on 7/6/14. i did not see any other people on the trail and felt very uneasy for the entire walk. i told myself that i had scared myself related to the potential bear sighting. it was a beautiful morning with no clouds whatsoever. i saw a reflection of something way up in the sky that caught my eye. when i really focused on it, it did not appear to be moving and there was no sound. i quickly took photos and told myself that i would review them when i got home. the object disappeared. i continued to walk to the west on the trail and remained very uneasy. i finally turned around and headed east. as i was walking i kept seeing flashes in the sky that i couldn't explain. i thought maybe it was the sun and decided to take a few short videos as i walked. i saw a few bicyclists on the way back and they were very pleasant as they rode by. however,i felt almost panicked by the time i got to my car and wanted to be indoors. this didn't make sense logically as it was a beautiful day and the people i had encountered at the end of my walk were pleasant. when i got home i reviewed the photos and video. the video shows something moving very quickly at several points and at one point there is a flash of light that moves upward after the object streaks across south west to northeast. i caught this by watching the video frame by frame. it us almost imperceptible otherwise. i felt very afraid the rest of the day and did not want to go outside that day. the feeling eased day by day after that. i have not returned to the trail since.
content.summary: Saw a disc hovering and took photos before it disappeared.Video after showed very fast moving object. stills revealed something unexplainable to me.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking along the poudre trail headed west when i thought i saw a bear in the distance. this would be unusual but not unheard of. i felt afraid and wondered if my eyes were playing tricks on me. it was approximately 0730 on 7/6/14. i did not see any other people on the trail and felt very uneasy for the entire walk. i told myself that i had scared myself related to the potential bear sighting. it was a beautiful morning with no clouds whatsoever. i saw a reflection of something way up in the sky that caught my eye. when i really focused on it, it did not appear to be moving and there was no sound. i quickly took photos and told myself that i would review them when i got home. the object disappeared. i continued to walk to the west on the trail and remained very uneasy. i finally turned around and headed east. as i was walking i kept seeing flashes in the sky that i couldn't explain. i thought maybe it was the sun and decided to take a few short videos as i walked. i saw a few bicyclists on the way back and they were very pleasant as they rode by. however,i felt almost panicked by the time i got to my car and wanted to be indoors. this didn't make sense logically as it was a beautiful day and the people i had encountered at the end of my walk were pleasant. when i got home i reviewed the photos and video. the video shows something moving very quickly at several points and at one point there is a flash of light that moves upward after the object streaks across south west to northeast. i caught this by watching the video frame by frame. it us almost imperceptible otherwise. i felt very afraid the rest of the day and did not want to go outside that day. the feeling eased day by day after that. i have not returned to the trail since.
content.summary: Saw a disc hovering and took photos before it disappeared.Video after showed very fast moving object. stills revealed something unexplainable to me.

content.detailedDescription:
I am requesting any info about my abduction that had to be witnessed to or was involved.
 this was in rumson nj 1971. as our family up from florida on vacation were headed home to stay with relatives we saw a light in the sky near the old rumson high school football field. what we saw was a craft almost as large as the field. i got out of the car and just stared at it. while staring noticed several other cars had pulled into parking lot. some crying. when i got back into the car everyone but our 5 family members were gone. i was the last of the family to get back into the car. looking out the window and noticing we were the ony ones in the parking lot pop just said they must have left. at that time and for a couple days the subject never came up. and it did not seem important to ant of us. i was the foster child of this family and they returned to florida and i stayed in nj at a new foster house. as i have gotten older now 58 i have very very memories about that night. i am out of touch with ex foster family so i don't know how they are dealing with it or even remember it,but the memories i have are not fictitious, but kind of like   you should tell someone about this. years ago i found an old apro ufo case that was submitted by my foster mother. it starts with mr. and mrs. a from florida with a drawing of the craft and a brief account of the evening. have tried to find file...Kids used floppy disc for music when first got computer and lost the info. well end of story...I was in craft...Sort of tortured for awhile. then one of them put his hand on my head and all pain subsided. we then spoke telepathically but after that only remember being shown parts of the universe through what seemed to be a huge window and the alien pointing and trying to describe things. i was only 16. i am reaching out for help. annoyed that i have tried to find more info about that night without a good response.

  thanks steve
content.summary: Entire family abducted

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine and his family had just watched the fireworks from our house and we were saying our goodbyes on our driveway just before midnight.  i was showing my friend and his family how beautiful the stars are at our location and was pointing out the milky way galaxy and other constellations.  i was pointing out our house faces a north easterly position and used the point of reference for north and south with the "handle" of the big dipper, and then roughly by 20 degrees from my over head position directly west there was a very bright light that seemed to open and close as if a door had opened or closed on the object.  it had the intesity of about a 1/10 of a full moon.  i watched it and and as it dulled i noticed a dim light about the intensity of a satelite running across the night sky but i was struck by how slow it was moving.  after my eyes adjusted after a few seconds i noticed that  there were two smaller lights trailing the lead light that i had originally identified.  i pointed it out to my friends who had been watching along as well.  "do you see that triangle?"  everyone agreed and we watched in disbelief.  i initally thought it may have been 3 jet fighters flying together as there is a local military base that frequently flies maneuvers, but they rarely are at night and ther was no sound.  then there were these tiny spots of light even less intense theat started to dart off in random directions off the main triangle shapped object.  a couple of them briefly swarmed around the triangle object for a brief few seconds and disapeared.  when the object was just roughly 10 degrees past overhead to the east (roughly 3-5 minutes after initial sighting) it stopped in mid air and hovered silently for an additional 5 minuetes.  then it slowly just moved on at the same pace in an easterly direction until slowly out of site when it reached the  mountain range roughly 30 miles east of our home.  i felt disbelief.  it was observed by 6 of us.  i feel we were all a little shaken up about the experience and we hastily said our goodbyes and they drove off and i ran back in the house to check on my children who were still sound asleep in their beds.
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft with multiple satelites darting off from it and randomly hovering around it.
